title: SPLT Whitepaper v1.1
body:
Proposal to replace the current $Split (SPLT) Whitepaper (v.1.0) with a new version (v.1.1).


Main changes:
- Token governance added
- Token release/buyback mechanics adapted 


Full version including all changes can be found here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PsfV-0Qw5c89eDuLzNl74cz-TKl1_pJC/view?usp=sharing
author: 0x848FF2a5179C96167B271673f7bb6597233F5F9e
